title: "Niche" very wide slab serif w/ inverted stress
content:
i quite like this typeface that i came across on a cafe website. any ideas? thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151718im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/slabserif_3615.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Script - Lucida Handwriting {Akira}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151718/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41055 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Spencer's openface Art Deco serif font - Mona Lisa {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151718/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41053 "Go to next forum topic")
author: aust.taylor

comments.content: a similar font is called Hefty

I have that same logo saved in my “what font is this?” folder. I just ran across FranTique today and I think it’s a pretty close match.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/frantique-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/frantique-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/frantique-nf/")

FranTique is not a 100% match ( [look at the uppercase C up close](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/frantique-nf/regular/mac-t1/391333/character/0043/CP4/1/)), but still pretty similar.
